title: Lost Maples State Natural Area - East Trail Loop
description: This loop trail is popular in the fall for its vibrant maple trees. Expect rocky paths, steep inclines, and great overlooks. Water levels vary seasonally.

title: Guadalupe River Paddle Trail
description: Gentle paddle route with family-friendly access. Great for tubing, kayaking, or SUP. Watch for crowds on weekends and float responsibly.

title: Enchanted Rock Summit Trail
description: A steep but short hike to the top of Enchanted Rock, offering breathtaking 360° views of the Hill Country.

title: Pedernales Falls River Walk
description: This easy walk offers access to the scenic Pedernales River, perfect for photography, light swimming, and relaxing by the falls.

title: Big Bend Hot Springs Trail
description: A short desert walk leads to riverside hot springs where hikers can soak with a view of the Rio Grande.
